title: Savior
description:
I was stolen. Hidden. Trapped in a hell beyond salvation.  Until him. Luca. The man who changed everything with his soothing words and vows of protection.  I shouldn't trust him. What he promises is something I gave up on long ago. And yet here I am, falling under the spell of a reality I crave.  I want him to save me. I need it. But I also learned long ago that the most ruthless men can hide behind pretty words and prettier faces.  
From International bestselling author, Eden Summers, comes the start of a thrilling duet in the Hunting Her series.
author: Eden Summers
